#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int dp[10000000];
int power(int m)
{
    if(dp[m])
        return dp[m];
    if(m==1)
        return 2;
        if(m==0)
            return 1;
    else if(m%2==0)
        {
            dp[m]=(power(m/2)*power(m/2))%10007;
            return dp[m];
        }
    dp[m]= (2*power(m-1))%10007;
    return dp[m];
}
int prime[10000001];
int main()
{
    int i,n,j,k=0;
    for(i=2;i<3500;i++)
    {
       if(!prime[i])
       {
        for(j=2*i;j<=10000000;j+=i)
        {
            prime[j]=1;
        }
       }
    }
    prime[2]=1;
    for(i=3;i<10000001;i++)
    prime[i]=((prime[i]^1)+prime[i-1]);
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        if(n==1)
            printf("0\n");
        else
            printf("%d\n",power(prime[n]-1));
    }
    return 0;
}
